duties_responsibilities.duty: Answering phone calls, receiving visitors, and providing general information to external and internal customers.
Organizing and coordinating data, information, and activities for the functional area and/or cross-functional areas.
Compiling information, writing, editing, and proofreading documents and reports.
Completing expense reports, filing, and data entry.
Preparing briefs, outlines, agendas, and presentations from publications, regulations, and documents.
Responsive to internal and external customer needs.
Demonstrating commitment to safety, quality, environmental awareness, and continuous process improvement.
Performing other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

education_certification.credential: HS Diploma, GED, or two (2) years equivalent work experience.
Prior experience with a phone system in a fast-paced, sales environment helpful.
Effective communication, interpersonal, and organizational skills.
General office experience and basic operation of standard office equipment.
Computer skills necessary include Windows, Excel, and Microsoft Word.
